Quickstride could barely believe his eyes, when he found himself and everyo=
ne else, in some sort of portal.  It was strange to him, yet he keeps his c=
omposure.

"I don't like this one bit.  I seriously hope we solve this issu=
e real soon, I'm getting sick of these games."
